channel.title: Clan Chat text colors
channel.description:
base - Overloadx/PI
refer to this link for more information: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,487372.0.html
Overall summary:
My clan chat keeps showing green text, my clanchathandler.java and clan.java is set up though so it should show @red@ when sending a message however it does not do this. I went to to textdrawingarea.java in my client and it is coming up with the correct hexi code.
Any help is good help.
